entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
